section.title: Exercise: Model add-on to remember the last focused widget
Target: Create focus model add-on
section.para: Currently your @Focus methods places the focus on the same widget every time the user switches focus. In this exercise you create a model add-on which places the last selected widget into the context and restores this last user selection.

section.title: Implementation: Create the model add-on
section.para: See vogella blog post for a description how to create this new model add-on.]
